Subject: First Things First: Story Titles
Description: First Things First: Story Titles: Which comes first, a story or its title? What makes a good title? Who gets to decide what that title would be? Should a title hint at the story to come, or only make sense after the story is read?   Speakers include:Jon David, Alex Kourvo, Christine Daigle - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Finding an Agent
Description: What are the best methods for finding the best agent for you?  Speakers include:Merrie Haskell, Ann Leckie, Mary Lynne Gibbs, Christine Daigle - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Writing Workshop
Description: Join us for a hands on workshop where writers would bring their pens, pencils, notepads, laptops, etc. to participate in numerous whimsical writing exercises. Exercises will consist of writing prompts playing with different themes, styles, voices, perspectives, etc. A prompt is given, a time limit is set, everyone writes as much as they can or want, and then people are encouraged to read what they've written aloud. The last half-hour will consist of personal, private critiques, so attendees are encouraged to bring 1-2 pages of their work to share and receive feedback from workshop facilitators.  Speakers include:Jen Haeger, Christine Daigle, Stewart Sternberg - Track: Literature  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes

Subject: Reading/Signing: Christine Daigle & Stewart Sternberg
Description: Join our attending authors in the Writers Block (317 & 318) for readings and signings!  Speakers include:Christine Daigle, Stewart Sternberg - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes
